NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Please complete your NCS application
Dear Parent or Guardian of {!Contact.Name},
We are aware that you tried to sign up to NCS with us recently but were not able to complete your application process because of technical issues with our system. We apologise for any inconvenience this may have caused you and assure you that these are now resolved.
We would encourage you to complete the application for {!Contact.FirstName} as places are filling up fast for NCS summer 2015 and we don’t want {!Contact.FirstName} to miss out on this once in a lifetime opportunity.
Click here to go to our booking website: https://bookings.ncsthechallenge.org/
If you have forgotten your log in details, you can recover them using the 'Forgotten password?' link on the log in page.
If you experience any further difficulties, you can find answers to frequently asked questions by clicking here - http://questions.ncsthechallenge.org/ - simply type your question or enter a keyword related to any issues you experience, alternatively please call us on 0203 542 2400, or email us at contact@ncsthechallenge.org .
Yours sincerely,
Tanya Dunne Head of Customer Services - The Challenge
VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
